remarks: Derive ~ ax-c15 from a hypothesis in the form of ~ ax-12 . ~ ax-c11n and ~ ax-12 are used by the proof, but not ~ ax-c11 or ~ ax-c15 .  TODO: figure out if this is useful, or if it should be simplified or eliminated.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2007.)
statement:
ax12a2.1 $e |- ( x = z -> ( A. z ph -> A. x ( x = z -> ph ) ) ) $.
ax12a2 $p |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( x = y -> ( ph -> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) ) ) $.
$d ph z $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
